name: CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40
about: What it is:u00a0A full-coverage matte foundation for oily skin, skin-balancing serum, and broad-spectrum SPF 40 sunscreen in one...Coverage:u00a0Full.Finish:u00a0Matte.Formulation:u00a0Cream..SPF:u00a0SPF 40Highlighted Ingredients:u00a0- Air Liciumu00ae: Instantly creates a skin-blurring effect; absorbs and reduces shine..- Lentil Seed Extract: Minimizes the look of pores..- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates dry skin and prevents the appearance of dry patches...Ingredient Callouts: Non-comedogenic, fragrance free and vegan formula...What Else You Need to Know: This color-correcting matte foundation delivers up to 24-hour skin hydration, 16-hour shine control, and sun protection without a white cast. The lightweight, sweat-proof CC cream immediately blurs the look of large pores while covering fine lines, dark circles, redness and uneven skin tone...Clinical Results: In an 8-week clinical test with daily use, results based on expert grading included:.- Less visible shine.- Improved skin texture.- Improved overall skin quality
ingredients: -Air Liciumu00ae: Instantly creates a skin-blurring effect; absorbs and reduces shine..-Lentil Seed Extract: Minimizes the look of pores. .-Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates dry skin and prevents the appearance of dry patches. ..Aqua/Water/Eau,Dimethicone,Isododecane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butylene Glycol, Silica, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Glycerin, Isohexadecane, Phenylbenzimidazole Sulfonic Acid, Titanium Dioxide [Nano]/Titanium Dioxide, Niacinamide, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Phenoxyethanol, Silica Silylate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Sorbitan Isostearate,Polyglyceryl-4 Isostearate, Sodium Hydroxide, Aluminum Hydroxide, Hexyl Laurate, Stearic Acid, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Lens Esculenta Seed Extract/Lentil Seed Extract, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Adenosine, Kaolin,Ethylhexylglycerin,Steareth-20, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1,Chrysin,Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7,Citric Acid, Biotin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply one to two pumps of foundation to clean skin..-Smooth an even layer onto your face, neck, and du00e9colletu00e9..-Remember: A little goes a long way....-With a large, fluffy foundation brush, begin blending at the center of your face and move outward..-Stipple for added coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using IT CC cream for years. I bought this one a few months ago and wasn't happy with the dry, icky texture it created, but I figured I'd just use extra moisturizer before using and make it work. A few weeks later, I went to my dermatologist because the skin on my face wouldn't stop peeling. I thought it was the weather changing or the beginning of some sort of skin condition. They asked me if I was using anything new, and I said no because I've been using IT for years, but the next morning, as I was getting ready, I was thinking this is a new formula. I went the same day and bought a different brand of foundation. It went on better, looked better, and after 3 or 4 days my face had completely stopped peeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40 by IT Cosmetics is my go-to foundation this season. Itu2019s so easy to apply, goes on smoothly and lasts all day. Also, since itu2019s SPF 40, I donu2019t have to apply sunscreen separately which saves me time in the morning, one less step in skincare/ makeup routine. The pump tube dispenses just the right amount of foundation which is enough for the full face. Itu2019s natural matte finish is great both for no-makeup makeup look and full glam look. My skin texture has improved since I started using this foundation. The CC+ cream has the benefit of skincare along with makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When BzzAgent offered me the chance to try this foundation, I decided to give it a shot, even though I usually use IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Color Correcting Foundation with SPF 50. Despite using moisturizer and setting powder, it seemed to cake and highlight all of my pores. The coverage wasn't bad, but it didnu2019t quite measure up to my usual foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a week I can say that the  coverage is truly medium to full coverage. It covered my dark spots as well as acne spots with little to no effort. My only complaint is that it did not cover the texture of my skin as good as I would have liked it to alone. Generally I do use primer before foundation but I wanted to give this product a try by itself first.  I will try with primer and see if it helps to smooth/blur the texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the CC+ Cream Natural Mate Foundation from IT Cosmetics in the Deep Honey shade for the past few weeks, and I'm really impressed with the results. As a woman with a deeper skin tone, finding a foundation that suits my natural color and that provides full coverage can be a challenge, but this product has more than achieved it. The Deep Honey shade is perfect for my skin, providing a natural shade without it looking artificial or out of tune. In addition, the durability is excellent; the makeup remains intact and without the need for retouching throughout the day. I would recommend it to anyone with deep skin tone who is looking for a product that offers both aesthetic and practical benefits.

I really liked the coverage, weight, and quality this foundation concealer has on my skin. Itu2019s not heavy, provides full coverage matte look and blends well with other skin care products. reviews.review_text: I was gifted CC+ Natural Matte Foundation by IT Cosmetics in exchange for my honest review. The shade is much too dark for me so Iu2019ve been using it as a bronzer/contour. I love the tube for travel reasons. Initially the coverage is great for a few hours, but it does break up & separate on my oily skin. Iu2019m going to try it using different primers, powders, & setting sprays to see what works best with it. I suggest using a small amount & building because otherwise this will feel like a full coverage foundation. I also recommend using a pore filling primer because it did extenuate some of my texture. Overall, great product if used properly :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted CC+ Natural Matte Foundation by IT Cosmetics in exchange for my honest review. This foundation is a matte superhero product. It reduced my T-Zone shine greatly while providing  a natural matte finish. I never got to try the previous formula, but this new product proves its cult status. I have slight redness and pores on my face and noticed that the foundation did a great job hiding redness and blurring my pores. I will say the only thing a user should be wary about is the actual thickness of the foundation itself. I think it applies best with a damp beauty sponge or in very thin layers depending on coverage needs. It will feel heavy and mask-like if over applied. I found this product to be quite multi-functional and used for concealer and spot coverage both which worked well. If you do plan on using this as an under eye concealer, make sure your eyes are moisturized before applying. Overall I really liked this product. The SPF is always a welcome addition plus it didnu2019t leave a white cast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This full-coverage matte foundation with a skin-balancing serum and built-in sunscreen is an absolute win for anyone with oily skin. The convenience of combining multiple products into one is a game-changer, especially for those with busy lifestyles. Whether youu2019re stepping out for a casual day or a special event, this foundation delivers a flawless finish that Iu2019ve come to appreciate greatly. I wholeheartedly recommend this gem for anyone looking to streamline their makeup routine while addressing the specific concerns of oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, soft matte, lightweight CC cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you, IT Cosmetics, for sending me your CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40 in exchange for my honest review. This foundation delivers a natural matte finish that effectively controls shine without looking flat. Overall, itu2019s a top choice for a flawless, long-lasting look with the added advantage of sun defense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! My skin loves it! It makes my skin look so smooth and lasts all day! It feels so light on my skin. Highly recommend this!

reviews.review_title: Great for travel and natural looks

reviews.review_text: I enjoyed the lasting wear on this CC cream. Easily buildable and had a natural finish. Took it on a staycation and felt like it gave me a nice summer fresh face.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my make up routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't believe I was doing my make up without this foundation for years. This foundation works wonders. I'm definitely going to start purchasing this foundation! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a flawless matte foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin

However, those with dry skin may need to use a hydrating primer to avoid a too-dry finish. Overall, itu2019s a solid choice for a lightweight, protective foundation.

reviews.review_title: Not a good match for my  my skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Not the best for dry skinu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It cosmetics blush in sun glow This product was a big win for me. First, the color is gorgeous! It is perfect for Summer because it really warms up the skin and looks great with and without other makeup products. It doesnu2019t lift my foundation or tinted moisturizer, which is always a concern for this type of cream that lays on top of a base. The formula actually seems to last on my skin through the day, despite the heat and even when I donu2019t set it with a setting powder. I would recommend a setting spray to maintain the glowy finish and color if you have an event or if you want to make absolutely certain that it will last all day/night. I really like this blush and it is a first for me with this brand. Recommend!  CC+ Natural Matte Foundation  I really love the coverage of this product for days when my skin is less than great. I wanted it to work so badly for me, but it seems like I have to heavily moisturize before use and then apply and then set with a setting spray to get it to look mostly okay even then, it is hard to make it work for my skin type. I have dry skin and this foundation really wants to emphasize that when I donu2019t go through all the steps mentioned above, which is difficult over the Summer. I sweat under all the moisturizer! I look forward to trying this again in cooler weather, but I worry that my skin will be in a drier state then at the same timeu2026. The coverage is top notch though! If you have an oily or normal skin type this might just be your full coverage holy grail!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: All in one Holy grail foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation shocked me as I was not expecting it to be as good as it is. I live in a high heat humid area and my makeup did not sweat or melt off within a few hours of application as usual. If you're searching for a foundation that does it all, look no further. The skin loving ingredients and SPF 40 has saved me time and steps in my skincare/makeup routine. It smoothed out my imperfections, covers my blemishes, and evened out my skin tone without feeling heavy or cakey. I have oily skin and did not experience any shine throughout the day just a beautiful matte finish. The color stays true throughout the day and I have not noticed any oxidizing or fading. I love that it has skin-loving ingredients like collagen, peptides, and hyaluronic acid. The SPF 40 is the cherry on top. It does have the SPF sunscreen smell but nothing overpowering and fades quickly. I have sensitive skin and it did not break me out or clog my pores. I have also noticed a wide range of shades which is nice to see.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I love how well it controls shine, especially around my nose. The SPF40 is a definite bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

The lightest shade was perfect for my pale skin. It feels good going on, and stays in place, just make sure you have a nice exfoliated base or it can stick to any sort of texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the opportunity to sample It Cosmetics CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40 thanks to @BzzAgent ! This is my new u201call-in-one foundation! Itu2019s a serum foundation that gives you the benefits of hyaluronic acid, air Lucius, and 3% lentil seed complex! Everything I need for my aging skin! I highly recommend it to everyone who wants this great benefits and ingredients in a skin balancing serum, foundation, and sun protection! This will be your new all-in-one foundation too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i really iove this foundation for days when I want a no makeup makeup look. however, it did take me a few shades to find the right one as it was way too light which only stinks because it costs alot of money. But it does apply beautifully AND protects my skin from the sun. Coverage is definitely buildable and a little product goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation for days when I want a no makeup makeup look. It applies beautifully AND protects my skin from the sun. Coverage is definitely buildable and a little product goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this cc cream. It is light weight, but full coverage and that is a huge plus for me! I think the shading range is great and it fits my skin tone perfectly. A little goes a long way with this product also! One of the best makeup products in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I found this to be a very good full coverage, matt, oil-free foundation with sunscreen. I had a hard time deciding which shade would match my skin tone.  I am a fair neutral and can wear cool in some brands. I chose the shade fair, which initially seemed too dark for my skin tone, but it was ok once I applied and blended it.  The formula is very matt, and you definitely need to put moisturizer on first. It provides  excellent full coverage and stays on all day. It felt very lightweight and comfortable to wear. I have sensitive skin, and it wasn't irritating. Because it's so matt, I thought it slightly emphasized my fine lines. When I applied it with a beauty blender, it provided the right amount of coverage without being too thick. I also found that I could layer in certain areas to get more coverage without being cakey by applying a light application. It's a very good lightweight matt foundation with excellent coverage and sunscreen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a color slightly a shade darker then my skin but ifs okay because I can fix it when I do the rest of the steps of my makeup so in the end it comes out looking good . I love that this CC cream is matte because I have combination oily skin, this CC cream stays put and lasts all day !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited that IT Cosmetics sent me this free sample to try through the BzzAgent sampling program! It is very smooth with medium coverage and does not feel heavy or thick. The matte finish lasted nicely throughout the day and I didnu2019t get oily. I love that it has the added skin benefits of serum and pore refining. I am noticing my skin looks better after using for a few weeks. I only use SPF foundations during the day so it keeps my skin protected. The light neutral was very spot on for color and gives a nice color correction for my red/brown pigmentation. I will be buying again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40 is a game changer for anyone who wants a do-it-all beauty product that actually works. If you've got oily or combination skin, the shine-reducing formula will give you a matte look without needing constant touch-ups. It's like having a full-coverage foundation, a skin-balancing serum, and sunscreen all rolled into one. So whether you're gearing up for a long day at work or a fun night out, you can count on this CC+ Cream to have your backu2014literally and figuratively.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great foundation that did everything it said it would do. It is very matte and stays that way for the whole day. It applies evenly and covers most of my blemishes and dark spots. However, be aware that it is heavier and thicker than some other foundations, so if you are looking for a more natural or dewy finish, this is not the foundation for you. If you are looking to cover up blemishes, then give this foundation a try since it might be a perfect fit for you! I liked how there were lots of colors to choose from, so it was easy finding the right shade for me. The pump also makes it easy to get the product out in the right amount. Though I have a lot of foundation left, I can feel that the tube bottle will make it easy to get all of the product out without wasting too much, unlike other solid foundation bottles. I also love that this foundation has some sunscreen, which can act as double protection over my base layer of sunscreen. Get this foundation if you are looking for a new full coverage, matte foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation; perfect for summer time. I have dry skin but this foundation though itu2019s matte still looks great on me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

The pump tube dispenses just the right amount of foundation which is enough for the full face. Itu2019s natural matte finish is great both for no-makeup makeup look and full glam look. My skin texture has improved since I started using this foundation. The CC+ cream has the benefit of skincare along with makeup.

I am suuuper oily and have sensitive, acne prone skin and this doesn't break me out or slide off my face 10/10

reviews.review_title: I love the SPF and itu2019s not oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you buzzagent for letting me review this product. I guess it wasnu2019t for me. The color was wrong and I didnu2019t like how it laid on my skin.

I received this product, along with the IT Cosmetics Glow With Confidence Sun Blush in the shade sunlit 10, in exchange for my honest review. I live in New England where we do have several months of weather that is almost as hot and just as humid.   First, I was never able to fully blend the product into my skin. Even with a setting spray, this quickly melted off my face leaving me looking worse than if I had absolutely no make up on it all.  I do love that the IT Cosmetics CC+ Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40  contains skin balancing serum and of course, a high SPF. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40, which I received for free in exchange for my review. Overall, I was impressed with its performance. Designed as a full-coverage foundation, it excels in providing a matte finish that effectively balances out redness, skin imperfections, and fine lines. The inclusion of a skin-balancing serum within the formula is a notable bonus, offering added skincare benefits alongside its makeup capabilities.  In my experience, the foundation worked exceptionally well to cover and blur some of my more persistent skin issues, such as redness and acne. However, I did find it a bit too heavy for everyday wear. To address this, I experimented with mixing the foundation with a moisturizer, which thinned it out and made it more comfortable for daily use without losing all of the coverage.   The added SPF 40 is a significant advantage, providing essential sun protection. While I wouldnu2019t rely on it as a sole sunscreen replacement, it's reassuring to have that extra layer of defense integrated into my makeup routine.  I appreciated the skincare-focused ingredients, which aligned with my desire for makeup products that offer more than just cosmetic benefits. If you're looking for a full-coverage, matte foundation that also prioritizes skin health, the CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation is a solid choice.

The only reason I gave it 4 stars was that the color is a bit dull, sort of flat, slightly, slightly veering towards a grey undertone. So it's definitely matte, but a very matte type of matte, if you want a little color dimension you might need to mix a little of something else into it. reviews.review_text: As an African American woman living with slight vitiligo, finding a makeup product that not only enhances my skin but also protects and improves its condition has always been a challenging endeavor. That is until I discovered IT Cosmetics Natural Matte CC+ Cream with SPF 40. This cream has been nothing short of a revelation for me, and I'm eager to share my experience with others who might be navigating similar skin concerns.First and foremost, the coverage is impeccable. The Natural Matte finish of this CC+ Cream is perfect for those who, like me, prefer a more subdued, shine-free look. It blends seamlessly into the skin, providing a uniform coverage that effectively masks the vitiligo spots without feeling heavy or cakey. The range of shades available is commendable, allowing me to find a match that compliments my skin tone beautifully, enhancing my natural complexion rather than masking it.The aspect of this CC+ Cream that truly sets it apart for me is its SPF 40 sunscreen protection. Sun exposure can exacerbate vitiligo, causing the light spots to become more pronounced. However, since incorporating this cream into my daily routine, I've noticed a significant reduction in the severity of my light spots. The high SPF content not only protects my skin from further sun damage but has also contributed to making the spots less severe over time, a benefit I hadn't found in any other product before.Another highlight is the formula's skin-loving ingredients. IT Cosmetics is known for infusing their products with high-quality, beneficial components, and this CC+ Cream is no exception. It's hydrating without being greasy, which is a fine line to walk for any skincare product. My skin feels nourished and soft, with a healthy, natural glow that lasts throughout the day.The wearability factor is also impressive. It stays put all day without needing touch-ups, even in hot, humid conditions. This longevity, combined with its matte finish and protective properties, makes it an

reviews.review_title: All in one, multi tasking products
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40 complimentary from @bzzagent and @itcosmetics for My honest review. I am surprisingly impressed with this product.  Even though the foundation has SPF it doesnu2019t irritate my skin and feels light weight on the skin. With SPF 40, this CC cream provides decent sun protection. It's a nice  for everyday wear.  The coverage is fantastic. It manages to even out my skin tone and cover any imperfections without feeling heavy or cakey. It's buildable, so you can achieve anything from a natural look to full coverage. However, the formula texture is a little dense and quick to absorb so you need to apply it quickly. For me, I use setting spray to help. As a person with combination skin, I appreciate the natural matte finish. It controls shine without making my skin look flat or dull. Plus, this Foundation blurs the look of pores; it doesn't settle into fine lines or pores, giving a smooth appearance.   I found on the website, Its cosmetics says this CC Cream lasts for 16 hours, but I feel it stays nicely for 8 to 9 hours then it starts to change a little.  Plus point, this CC cream is infused with skincare ingredients like hyaluronic acid, peptides, and niacinamide, which help to hydrate, smooth, and improve the overall health of your skin with continued use. The full coverage color correcting, serum foundation with a built-in primer, sun protection, all-in-one, multi-tasking, IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream Natural Matte Foundation with SPF 40 is a hard to pass product for combination and oily skin. Whether you're looking for coverage, sun protection, or skincare benefits, this CC cream has you covered. It is good to have for daily use or travel

I really enjoyed using this product, appreciated the 40spf, and its staying power. The cons I did not find it hydrating. In fact I felt like it highlighted any dry spot on my face. Ensure you are fully moisturized before using, sometimes I even needed to blend in more moisture after applying. I would have given it 5 stars if it werenu2019t for how dry I felt it made my skin look and the extra steps needed to correct that. IT cosmetics is a brand I really enjoy, they consistently make quality products, and this foundation is no different. I think if you have oily skin this would be the best product for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is easily one of the best matte foundations I have used in the last several years. I have super oily skin, year-round and nothing I do keeps the oil at bay for more than a few hours. I've tried it all- primers, setting sprays, mattifying moisturizers, and just about every mattifying foundation on the market. This, by far, kept my skin from shinning like a disco-ball more than anything else I have tried. I typically apply my makeup around 6:30 am before I head to work, and don't wash it off until about 7:00 pm. Throughout the day, I keep up on blotting powder and mattifying sprays to keep the oil under control- applying both 3-4 times a day. Not only did I not have to break out the setting spray, but I didn't even have to apply the blotting powder until late afternoon, and that was just for a quick touch-up!  I've been wearing this product just about everyday since receiving it, and it has held up during busy work weeks, evenings out, weekends at the coast (including one very humid weekend), and I can honestly say I'm incredibly impressed by its ability to hold up under just about every circumstance. * Note- I received this product in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks IT Cosmetics and BzzAgent for the IT Cosmetics Foundation! I received this product for free through the BzzAgent sampling program.   I wanted to love the IT Cosmetics Foundation in Rich Cool. It has a lot going for it: medium, buildable coverage and ingredients that nourish the skin.  While the quality wasn't bad, the foundation itself just felt a bit too heavy for my liking.  Nice Coverage and Hydration On the plus side, the coverage was thorough. I also appreciated the hydrating ingredients like hyaluronic acid and aloe vera.   Too Thick for My Taste  However, the foundation's thickness was a dealbreaker for me.  It felt a bit heavy on my face, and I had a hard time achieving a truly natural look. I found that I needed a very light application to avoid looking mask-like.  Recommendation  If you, like me, prefer a lightweight, barely-there feel, this one might be a bit too heavy.  I would recommend trying a sample first to see if the weight works for you.

reviews.review_title: The holy grail of my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it cosmetics CC+ color correcting, pore refining, full coverage cream with skin balancing serum and spf 40 from It Cosmetics and Bzzfeed in exchange for my honest review. As an aging woman my skin has changed a lot so I am always looking for something to help me not only assist in covering up but also preventing further damage. I hate the dark uneven spots I have, and wrinkles that have developed with age and most foundations I have tried tend to settle right into the lines and pores accentuating them. However I was very surprised by this product not only did the smallest amount (seriously like the size of a pea) cover my entire face giving it a smooth even look it also did not become settled in to the areas I want to cover the most Add to that the fact it is also a sunscreen preventing further skin damage and this product has become the Holy Grail of my makeup routine and albeit it may be a little on the pricey side I promise it is worth every penny and honestly with the littlest amount needed it will last for a long time and probably save you money in the long run. Seriously this should be a staple in all womenu2019s makeup routines because not only is it good for aging women the protection is good for women who are younger but want to age gracefully.

reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of It Cosmetics, but I had never tried their foundation before. So, I was excited to give their full coverage CC+ Cream Natural Matte a try. One of the things I love about this product is its versatility. It not only protects your skin with SPF 40, but it also color corrects, provides full coverage, and has a formula that includes a skin-balancing serum that doubles as a primer.  I tried it initially with nothing on my face to see how it worked, and I was blown away by the immediate coverage and elimination of redness. The formula is light, creamy, and spreads nicely onto the skin, leaving it looking matte, natural, and smooth. It is not at all cakey or overwhelming, and even on my aging skin, it doesn't settle into my fine lines or make me look older.  I have been using this product every day since then and even during my workouts, and I have noticed that it lasts without budging. This is hands down my new favorite foundation, and I would recommend it to anyone with aging (37) combo skin like mine. Additionally, the shade Fair Beige (c) was a perfect match for my skin tone.

This is actually great coverage for a CC cream and has more coverage than other CC creams Iu2019ve tried. I did a quick application test and usually color correct underneath any type of foundation but wanted to see how well the cream would cover my dark spots and it did pretty good even though I was lightly working it into my skin (Iu2019m usually more heavy-handed and with light application the coverage did a good job so Iu2019m thinking I may not have to color correct at allu2014it is a CC cream after all). This is my summer shade but I can still work with it until then. This being an all-in-one with the addition of the skin balancing serum and SPF 40 sunscreen is a plus and it doesnu2019t feel like I have makeup on my skin. reviews.review_text: I received a full size bottle of CC+ Natural Matte Foundation in exchange for honest feedback. I've used it several times a week over the course of a couple weeks. I have combination skin and am in my late 30u2019s with smooth skin and a few lines and freckles. The bottle has a pushbutton applicator that neatly dispenses a drop at a time which I really like. Makes application cleaner if using fingers in a rush AND uses less product. Considering this stuff is $47 dollars a bottle, that's ideal. Application goes on smoothly and coverage is buildable. I felt some areas of my skin were a bit dry (flakey/cakey), even after exfoliation and moisturizing. So for those areas, I started mixing a drop of the foundation 50/50 with lotion which took care of the issue. I didnu2019t break out or have any rashes during use. Longevity was better than expected. I tried it alone, with primer, and with powder on top. I tested the sunscreen by mowing my yard in makeup lol. It lasted! Though I would prefer a formulation without sunscreen. The shade u2018Medium Coolu2019 was even natural, without making me look like some crazy orange person. Best of all, my dark circles were covered better than anything Iu2019ve used!! Thank you for that!! Overall, this stuff worked well for me and despite the price, Iu2019ll be buying some more when mine runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review.  I've never tried a matte skin tint/cc cream before, so this was my first experience with that. The smell of sunscreen quickly wafted past my nose as I pumped the creamy foundation onto the back of my hand. You can apply with a brush for medium to full coverage, or blend withyour fingers for lighter coverage. Opting for the latter, I spread half a pump onto my face with my fingers. I learned the hard way that it's easy to apply too much product, so I started small and added more if it felt necessary. It immediately mattified upon application, which seems great for the normal to oily types. I used a setting spray to get a slightly dewier finish. Other than that, it minimized pores and facial redness pretty easily and with little product. The matte finish draws attention away from surface texture that would otherwise be highlighted by a shinier or dewier finish. Unfortunately, it clung to dry patches. Ultimately, it felt more like a foundation than a CC cream. I didn't really feel the skincare elements that CC creams claim to have. It also didn't mix well with my moisturizing primer, so I would definitely only use this on hydrated skin that is either freshly washed or is prepped with moisturizer.   pros: - covers redness easily - minimizes pores - matte finish de-emphasizes surface texture - good for normal/oily skin - SPF protection  cons: - emphasizes dry patches - not very moisturizing - does't play well with primers

Additionally, its SPF 50+ protection makes it an ideal choice for everyday wear, providing added defense against harmful UV rays.  Without a doubt, I would buy this product again. reviews.review_title: Shes thick, but easily adjustable. Lasts all day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so grateful to BzzAgent for sending me this CC+ Natural Matte Cream Foundation for free in exchange for my opinion. This review is honest & authentic for this foundation, based on my combo/oily, acne prone, textured skin. This is a VERY matte foundation, and it dries VERY quickly. I advise applying it in sections. I applied it onto the back of my hand & mixed it with some blue+white foundation adjusters as I am a fair/light skintone with neutral-olive undertones, and I noticed immediately how thick the consistency is due to how much adjuster I had to add. It isn't unusual for full coverage tinted moisturizers to have thicker consistencies, however this also oxidizes as it dries down & it does so very quickly. I had to go in with a lighter concealer to even my complexion out, but that's just a shade issue-I am curious to see if there's a shade I can actually use without too much mixing effort. I wish they had a better shade range.  Now, I work in a restaurant as a cashier/waitress/cook, and I've worn this foundation while working a double shift (10am-12am, opened & closed) and I didn't have to touch up as much throughout the day, which I'm usually an oily/sweaty mess within 2 hours. I have some dry patches around my nostril, where my nose was recently pierced 8 weeks ago, and I just had to exfoliate really well in that area & carefully hydrate specific areas of my face. This foundation does seem to sit better on my skin when I have time to let my skincare fully set, but I have mixed it with a hydrating primer serum right after washing my face without any other skincare-it kept it from drying as quickly, which I appreciated.   TLDR; great for overly oily skin, a little more effort for combo/dry skin, but I'm sure this will be a great summer date night foundation. It handles my 12+ hr work days beautifully. Dries quickly, can be used for experimenting + mixing with other products to adjust to the different needs of my skin. Needs a better shade range.

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so in love with this product. It blends well with my skin tone

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a natural makeup look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. Itu2019s full coverage. It blends great with a sponge and a brush. I love the matte finish and it takes a while before the oil shows on my face. Iu2019ve been using it for a few weeks now and itu2019s now a stample for a light makeup day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try out but my shade was too dark. I tried it as contour and it is full coverage. I love the packaging, super easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has buildable coverage with a beautiful finish. It's easy to blend and has impressive coverage without feeling heavy or looking cakey. The added benefits of sunscreen and hydrating ingredients are also an added bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends so well and doesnu2019t make me oily. It last all day and sets well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent in exchange for a honest review.  I have had some bad experiences with IT cosmetics in the past which made me not want to seek them out, mostly involving the shade range. When I saw this product had some more shades, including one I felt more comfortable in, I still had doubts but decided to try it. Well, I can say when I'm  wrong because this was such a good match to me, shade wise. I also enjoyed the formula - I avoided cc creams since it wasn't matte and this formula was and it didn't make me look 'dry'. I liked how it looked on me a lot, and I did get compliments because of it, which helped.   However, I don't think it works well with EVERY primer I have, but that's a 'results may vary' thing. I also don't think this is best if you wear face masks often like I do, unless you prep and set really well. I have several instances when my foundation is basically on the inside of my mask and not on me. If you plan on wearing this, set your CC cream well or just wear it when you're not going to wear a mask. Besides that, I really do like it and I will continue to wear it.

reviews.review_title: Sunscreen and Foundation all in one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was very long lasting and cake-free. I really love the easy pump application tube, it makes application hassle-free. Also, I really like that it a good coverage while also protecting your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did like the creamy texture and the buildable aspect of the product, unfortunately it wasn't the exact color, so I will try and find the right or closest match, so that I can continue using it. It was light and smooth application, will like to see how long I can go with out having to retouch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation. The application is so easy and with the SPF 40, it's like an all in one product for me. Would definitely recommend for a flawless and easy application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation and I love how it's blendable. I actually got the wrong shade it was too dark so I blend it with another foundation that I got that was too light and its the perfect match for my complexion. It looks so natural sometimes people don't even know I have makeup on. I will be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After doing a patch test on hand, the foundation color didnu2019t match me. I shouldu2019ve gotten a lighter shade. So this review is based on everything besides that. The consistency of the liquid was light, not too thick, but also very pigmented. The product is smooth on the skin, and doesnu2019t make my skin look dull. The bottle also has a nice press tube dispenser on top, which I like.  I would try it again, in another shade to test on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product, the application was very creamy and it was easy to spread through out my skin. At the end I had a very smooth and clean looking base, which I loved!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation, it has amazing coverage and it definitely holds true to the claim of being a very matte foundation. The finish is nice but I recommend really moisturizing the skin before using this product and probably using a hydrating finishing spray at the end because this can look really and may be a bit too matte.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to look for foundations that have coverage, but without looking cakey and this was it for me. I got it a little darker than my complexion and used it for a light contour. It does have to be set well to not transfer. The added SPF 40 was a bonus for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Def a great foundation to have for the summer months. Nice coverage and has a pretty high SPF level. Def worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! the smoothness, the color, it was like silk! I would like to try a few different shades as i believe this is a product everyone can use of all shades. Worth every dime!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you so much for allowing me to sample this product. This product when I applied it on my face it was a little bit darker than I had expected. It did give my face a nice color however, I thought that the color was a bit too heavy for my face, and it did not like the way it looked once I applied it. One of the things that I decided to do differently when I applied it the second time was to just use a little, but I had to blend it with my lighter foundation to give my face the natural color I was looking for. Overall, I was very pleased with the product and it did last quite a bit on my face for 12+ hours.

reviews.review_title: New addition for a night out.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this is product! I am normally not a foundation wearer but this product has converted me. It goes on smooth, has medium with buildable coverage, lasts all day and is almost a perfect match. 1st pic is with product 2nd pic is without. I will say it is slightly darker than my current shade but will be a perfect match for the summer. I do have to say that I kind of felt like it left my face flat/no dimension that my natural skin has. I love the look of my natural skin but this foundation is like giving your face a blank canvas.

reviews.review_title: Bomb full coverage with all the CC cream benefits!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how full coverage this is for a CC cream. I was shocked when with such a small amount applied, my prominent facial scar disappeared! I love the formula and I feel that it definitely gave a poreless texture. It was lightweight and breathable. I would have given it five stars but the deep tone was a bit dull and didnu2019t provide much vibrancy to the skin, not so much in finish, but in hue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to receive this. The shade is close but not an exact match. However I still like that it is lightweight, breathable and easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing per it cosmetics usual! Love the pump and the fact that itu2019s mattefying for me with oily skin this is essential to keeping shine down! The spf is also a great addition!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for a few weeks now and I love it. It has great coverage..easy application and it lasts me all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!!! The shade I received was a bit orange on my skin tone but using a small amount and some concealer makes it work! I love that it long lasting and very light on the skin. And the best part,.. it has spf!!

reviews.review_title: A must have for my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the IT Cosmetics CC+ Cream for a bit now, and it's been a game changer for my daily routine. The matte finish is perfect for my oily skin, keeping me looking fresh without any shine. Plus, the SPF 40 is a massive win for protecting my skin while I'm out and about. It blends effortlessly, offering great coverage without feeling heavy. Totally recommend if you're looking for something reliable and easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised that I liked this foundation due to my past experiences with spf foundation. I also tried it in a client and she loved her makeup even asked for the link to purchase this product for her upcoming girls trip.

reviews.review_title: It Cosmetics CC + Natural Matte Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This wonderful product that i had recieved It Cosmetics CC + Natural Matte Foundation is a 10/10 foundation i have found that works amazing as an full coverage base. It completely covers any kind of slight redness or little blemishes that might needed to be covered. Even with it being a matte coverage it still gives your skin a dewy kinda of look as well with it. Definitely have found the product i will consistently be using!!! Absolutely wonderful product!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved It Cosmetics and this foundation is light and feels like skin. It is very easy to apply and long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was unfortunately too dark for my skin tone so my review is based on the packaging, texture, scent, and the overall ease of use.  The packaging is cute and I like the ease of the pump. I was a little thrown off by the texture dye to it being so thick...it is definitely full coverage, it being a cc cream base I anticipated it being a little lightweight. The scent was not strong at all. I would use this product in my correct shade during cooler weather but I think it would be too heavy for spring/summer time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love IT Cosmetics products - they always work so well with my dry, sensitive, acne-prone skin. I am a huge fan of their other CC creams, but sometimes they can leave my face looking a bit too dewy, so I was excited to try this one. The cover is amazing!! I was dealing with a pretty bad  breakout and it covered it so well - I didn't even need concealer!! It is a matte finish, but it's not too matte. As far as i've noticed, it has not broken me out any. My only con about this foundation is it did seem a bit too heavy for my skin. I'm used to lighter foundations / skin tints. I would wear this more on days when I need a more full coverage look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When compared to a BB cream the consistency is thicker and more mattifying.  It is also more opaque, therefore it is less forgiving when it comes to color matching. Medium, buildable coverage. Works well with other products and it is long lasting.  I love the packaging, pump is the most convenient. A small amount gives great coverage.  It dries up quickly,  I suggest applying on small areas and blending immediately. Fingertips application worked best for me. I have combination skin, my t-zone needed constant powder retouching. I would not recommend it for dry skin,  unless it is heavily moisturized first. No fragrance. Applied in small amount feels like skin, but a layer of additional sunscreen is needed in my opinion. I tried color light-medium warm, I find it a litle bit pale for me. I will be looking for a better match next time I visit the store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this CC Cream/ Foundation. It felt lightweight, offered great coverage and was smooth and breathable. I also really liked the finish as it was really natural and dulled any unnecessary shine of excess oil on my face. Such an easy and flawless base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation. The coverage was really good and the shade matched my skin tone perfectly. It is buildable and does not feel too heavy or cakey. I love that it includes SPF and other skincare benefits. I will definitely buy this again and I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Full coverage for me who has a bunch of red acne scars and few active acne spots to cover. I have sensitive, combination skin and this sits well on my face, the shade I got was a little dark on my pale winter skin, but I think it will be a good match for summer. It is definitely matte, but doesn't feel dry or heavy. You can use their color matching on their website to find your correct shade. IT Cosmetics is a great brand and I absolutely love their original line so I was excited to give their new matte version a try.Always a bonus to have SPF 40! The matte version is good for those who have oily skin or lean oily during the warmer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Once I applied it all over my entire face I was happy that it felt nice, and light. It felt like my pores could still breath even though I had this product on. I also have to say the application was very smooth which I appreciate because some products don't go on well. The cc cream is a great color corrector, but the fact that it has SPF in it to protect you while outdoors, is a huge plus. Make sure to apply 15 minutes prior to going outside. The only negative thing here for me is that the color was not a good color for me, must've messed up on the color match. This color is at least two shades lighter than I need it to be. I like how it felt so much on my skin, that I will seek it out in my correct color. I do recommend you purchase it! Sometimes when I put tinted products, with SPF on my face, not long after my face gets a little bit itchy. I didn't have this problem with this product, and I don't normally have sensitive skin either, so the fact that this product didn't make me have that same response after applying it, was great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary to sample & I will be using this more in my routine. It has an amazing consistency and blended on my skin better than other matte foundations Iu2019ve used. It isnu2019t cakey and the coverage is phenomenal. I used it on a night I went to an arcade and it did well when I sweated too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand! I think the shade was a bit off but thatu2019s expected when receiving an item to try for free online as opposed to going into the store for color matching. Definitely give this a try! It has great coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh yes! I own this in the glow version and I love this even more. A little goes a long way for coverage. I used a brush for application. Such a quick makeup routine. I like a very natural look. I put on primer and then this. Nothing else. Iu2019ve been rocking it for 8 hrs and it still looks good.

reviews.review_title: A great alternative to my designer foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m got this in the color TAN. It has a smooth, silky texture that goes on easily. I like that coverage is easily build able but never fairly. The formula is also super light and doesnu2019t feel heavy on the skin, which is important for me because I live in a state with high humidity practically year round. For a CC cream I was pretty impressed. I have combination skin that is quite oily in my T-zone. I had the product on for 10 hours. With the exception of my nose, which gets VERY OILY, it still looked great by end of day, but I intentionally didnu2019t touch up my makeup during the day so I could see how this performs. I will definitely re-powder my nose at midday and in the evening (if going out) to keep oiliness away, but Iu2019m impressed that my forehead and chin didnu2019t get oily AT ALL. This is a great alternative to my full coverage designer foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent this product to review and have been using it for a few weeks. Even though I was sent a shade too light for me, I used a lot of bronzer to make it work, and it was beautiful! The finish is a natural matte finish, being that I am oily t-zone and normal to dry everywhere else. This didnu2019t make me feel uncomfortable or like I needed more moisture. The coverage is medium-full and looks so good on. I typically use the Beauty Blender skin tint or the NARS Light reflecting. So the consistency of this foundation is a little thicker than the Beauty Blender foundation. But the wear of this was was great! I wore it from 10am to 10pm, with no problems of it disappearing or getting patchy. Iu2019ve never been one to use the IT cosmetics foundations, but this one will be a staple for me. Iu2019m so happy I tried this, because honestly I never would have thought about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For a CC cream its coverage is really good. It wasnu2019t too heavy. I really like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using IT Cosmetocs CC+ Cream for a few weeks, I am hooked.  It didn't dry my skin out like some foundations tend to do.  The added SPF 40 is a welcome addition without adding another product to the skincare routine.  Will definitely use in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely feel like an u201cITu201d girl with this foundation. I also love that it comes with built in SPF. Itu2019s super lightweight & truly matte. An absolute 10/10.

reviews.review_title: A must have for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Makeup ruined by oily skin- I donu2019t think so, not anymore. It has been such a game changer. I love it cosmetics cc+cream but i would always end up oily and just a hot mess. The matte foundation is perfect for me. I just use my usual moisturizer and then apply the cc + cream natural matte and I am good to go. Bonus for the spf!! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this for a couple weeks now and I love it . The texture is very nice, smooth, feels light weight on skin . I would recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this CC cream sadly the color was too dark for me but I loved the finish of it not drying but matte and excellent coverage totally going to buy this CC cream in my correct shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight, buildable, did not feel cakey. Excited to see how it holds up this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The iT Cosmetics Foundation in Deep Honey is an absolute game-changer for those seeking flawless coverage with skincare benefits. As someone with a deeper skin tone, finding a foundation that matches seamlessly while providing nourishment can be a challenge, but Deep Honey delivers on all fronts.  First and foremost, the shade match is impeccable, blending effortlessly into my skin without any harsh lines or oxidation throughout the day. The formula feels lightweight yet offers impressive coverage, evening out imperfections and providing a radiant, natural finish.  What sets this foundation apart is its skincare-infused formula, featuring ingredients like hyaluronic acid, peptides, and antioxidants. Not only does it provide coverage, but it also works to hydrate and improve the overall health of my skin, leaving it looking plump and radiant.  I appreciate that this foundation is long-wearing and doesn't settle into fine lines or emphasize texture, making it perfect for all-day wear. Plus, its SPF 50 broad-spectrum protection ensures my skin stays shielded from harmful UV rays. Overall, iT Cosmetics Foundation in Deep Honey is a true standout in the world of complexion products. With its impeccable shade range, nourishing formula, and impressive coverage, it has earned a permanent spot in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_title: Sadly, not for my current skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product left me with very mixed feelings. Unfortunately, for my current dry and flaking winter skin (especially since having begun Tret a few months ago), it simply was too matte of a finish for me and tended to collect on my dry patches. Even *despite* proper exfoliation and applying multiple hydrating products, beforehand. I do love how buildable this product is, however, and I look forward to trying this product again in the summer - once my skin stops throwing a tantrum and the humidity rises! Ultimately, though, there were enough things I *did* like about this product/formula that it has led me to look into other IT Cosmetics products similar to this to possibly replace my current med-high coverage foundation with something on the lighter side. My hopes remain high!

reviews.review_title: Perfect foundation for the no make up-make up days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so glad I got this product for free in exchange for my review. All my opinions are honest and have not been influenced by anyone. I've been a long time user of IT Cosmetics BB cream. When I recieved the CC cream I was excited ti try it as my rosacea has been acting out lately as I get older. My skin is a combination of normal, dry spots, and oily T zone. I know the joys of being me lol. This foundation does a great job of keeping my T zone under control, while keeping my normal skin supple, I did notice that i have to be extra careful in taking care of my dry patches before hand but nothing that i didnt have to deal with before. It does help balance my rosasea, specially when I go for fuller coverage. The only thing I dont love is that it is not a long lasting foundation, specially if you will be out and about. If I wanted to last all day I had to use a primer and a setting spray, which I rather not do. Or I had to do touch ups through the day.

reviews.review_title: Nice add on to A foundation routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage and stays matte for the entire day. Priced ok for the brand.  A little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the higher SPF on this, as most foundations with SPF typically run between 15-30 that Iu2019ve seen. The foundation is medium coverage, thatu2019s easily buildable and blends out very nicely. It feels light on my skin, which works well for me as I love having a more natural and not a u201ccakeyu201d look. My skin is dryer during the winter, so for this time of year I wouldnu2019t typically use a matte foundation, which is my only complaintu2026 however that will be different for all skin types and what look youu2019re trying to achieve. Iu2019m excited to try this during the warmer, summer months.  During use my skin tone was visibly evened out and looked smooth and natural. No visible changes to my pores, unfortunately, however once set with setting powder it was an easy enough fix.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
